tool_description: With this API you can check newest CRYPTO information there is. You can check crypto currency, value and much more.
name: Newest Crypto Information Live
title: Newest Crypto Information Live

api_list.name: Specific Bitcoin News
api_list.description: Here you can fetch Bitcoin news from a specific news portal.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newest-crypto-information-live.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/bitcoin/coindesk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newest-crypto-information-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://newest-crypto-information-live.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/bitcoin/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newest-crypto-information-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Ethereum News Endpoint
api_list.description: Here you can fetch all data from three different news portals which are getting information about Ethereum.

api_list.name: Bitcoin News Endpoint

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newest-crypto-information-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
